snippet: An obscure disease with which up to 10 million people may be infected costs the American economy $900 million a year, a study showed.
lead_paragraph: An obscure disease with which up to 10 million people may be infected costs the American economy $900 million a year, a study showed.

headline.seo: Chagas Disease Costs U.S. More Than Better-Known Illnesses
headline.main: Chagas Disease Costs U.S. More Than Better-Known Illnesses
headline.print_headline: Chagas Disease Costs U.S. More Than Better-Known Illnesses
